title: Demand rises for coffee, demand rises for cups

content.prompt: Assume the market for disposable coffee cups is in equilibrium and disposable coffee cups are inputs for serving brewed coffee. Which of the following will result in a higher short-run equilibrium price of disposable coffee cups?

choices.label: A decrease in the supply of coffee
A decrease in the number of locations serving brewed coffee
An increase in the supply of disposable coffee cups
An increase in the demand for brewed coffee
An increase in the price of tea, a complement for coffee

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
